2026-02-13T12:37:06.6413201Z [36;1m# Mask immediately to prevent timing vulnerabilities[0m
2026-02-13T12:37:06.6413589Z [36;1mAPI_KEY=$(openssl rand -base64 45 | tr -d '/+=')[0m
2026-02-13T12:37:06.6414131Z [36;1mecho "::add-mask::${API_KEY}"[0m
